page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: The oldest housing in the area of the grid are the farmhouses such as Fullingcott and Bickleton which can be traced back over 800 years. The hamlet of Instow Town contains cottages over 200 years old, one being the old blacksmith's cottage. The hamlet of Worlington on the other hand consists of modern housing designed to take advantage of the fine views over the estuary. Along the main road ribbon development has taken place with larger estates now being developed. The area is convenient for commuting to Bideford and Barnstaple. However, there are no amenities serving these developments.
